org.openscience.cdk.interfaces

Interface IMolecularFormulaSet

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, ICDKObject
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAdductFormula
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdductFormula, DebugAdductFormula, DebugMolecularFormulaSet, MolecularFormulaSet, NNAdductFormula, NNMolecularFormulaSet

    public interface IMolecularFormulaSet
extends ICDKObject
    Class defining a molecular formula object. It maintains a list of list IMoleculaFormula.

    Examples:

    • [C5H5]-
    • C6H6
    • 12C513CH6
    Author:
    miguelrojasch
    Keywords:
    molecular formula
    Created on:
    2007-11-20
    Belongs to CDK module:
    interfaces
    Source code:
    HEAD
